alert.note: Alert for Scotland (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 29 at 9:55AM CDT until June 29 at 10:30AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Quad Cities has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Scotland County in northeastern Missouri... * Until 1030 AM CDT. * At 955 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Bible Grove, or near Memphis, moving east at 80 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Rutledge around 1000 AM CDT. South Gorin, Granger, Arbela, Etna, Prospect Grove and Azen around 1005 AM CDT. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
